BlazeGears.Form

A class that represents an HTML form in an object-oriented way.

Superclasses

BlazeGears.BaseClass

Dependencies

BlazeGears.BGTL

Summary
BlazeGears.FormA class that represents an HTML form in an object-oriented way.
Variables
actionThe action property of the form.
attribsEach key of this dictionary will be an attribute of the form.
elementThe element which will contain the form.
eventsEach key of this dictionary will be an event of the form.
templatesEach key of this dictionary will be the default BGTL template for the matching field types.
textsEach key of this dictionary will be the default text-pack for the matching field type.
Functions
createFieldAdds a field to the form.
createHtmlAdds a chunk of unescaped HTML to the form.
generateGenerates the code for the form and outputs it into the target element, if there’s one.
getFieldFinds a field in the form.
getIdReturns the ID of the form.
validateTells if all the form’s fields meet the requirements.
BlazeGears.Form.FieldA class that represents a field of a form object.
Variables
attribsEach key of this dictionary will be an attribute of the field.
columnsThe horizontal dimension of a textbox.
eventsEach key of this dictionary will be an event of the field.
labelThe human-readable name of the field.
rowsThe vertical dimension of a textbox.
templateIf it isn’t null, the field will use this BGTL template upon generating itself, instead of the ones provided by the form object.
textsIf it isn’t null, the field will use this text-pack upon generating itself, instead of the ones provided by the form object.
valueThe default value of the field.
Functions
createOptionAdds an option to the field.
createRuleAttaches a rule to the field.
getElementIdReturns the ID of the field’s input element.
getIdReturns the ID of the field.
getOptionsReturns an array of the field’s option objects.
getValueReturns the value of the field’s input element.
BlazeGears.Form.OptionA class that represents an option of a field object.
Variables
attribsEach key of this dictionary will be an attribute of the option.
eventsEach key of this dictionary will be an event of the option.
labelThe human-readable name of the option.
selectedIf it’s true, the option will be marked as selected upon generation.
valueThe value of the option.
Functions
getElementIdReturns the ID of the option’s input or option element.
getIdReturns the ID of the option.

Variables

action

action: ""

The action property of the form.

attribs

attribs: { "class": "BlazeGears-Form", "method": "post" }

Each key of this dictionary will be an attribute of the form.

element

element: null

The element which will contain the form.  It can be either an ID or a reference to an actual element.

events

events: {}

Each key of this dictionary will be an event of the form.  The “on” prefix will be applied to the keys automatically.

templates

templates: {button: "...", hidden: "...", password: "...", radios: "...", select: "...", submit: "...", text: "...", textarea: "..."}

Each key of this dictionary will be the default BGTL template for the matching field types.

See Also

BlazeGears.BGTL

texts

texts: {}

Each key of this dictionary will be the default text-pack for the matching field type.

Functions

createField

createField: function(self,
id,
type)

Adds a field to the form.

Arguments

idThe ID and name of the field.  This must be an unique value for this form.
[type = “text”]Decides which keys the field will try to use from the templates and texts dictionaries upon generation.

Return Value

Returns a reference to the field object, if it was successfully created, else null.

Field Types

buttonCenter aligned button without a label.
checksA group of checkboxes.  Uses BlazeGears.Form.Field.createOption.
hiddenHidden input field.
radiosA group of radio buttons.  Uses BlazeGears.Form.Field.createOption.
selectSelect list.  Uses BlazeGears.Form.Field.createOption.
submitCenter aligned submit button without a label.
textSingle-line textbox.
textareaMultiline textbox.

See Also

BlazeGears.Form.Field

createHtml

createHtml: function(self,
content)

Adds a chunk of unescaped HTML to the form.

Arguments

contentThe HTML code to be added.

generate

generate: function(self)

Generates the code for the form and outputs it into the target element, if there’s one.

Return Value

Returns the generated code of the form.

getField

getField: function(self,
id)

Finds a field in the form.

Arguments

idThe ID of the sought field.

Return Value

Returns a reference to the field, if it exists, else null.

See Also

BlazeGears.Form.Field

getId

getId: function(self)

Return Value

Returns the ID of the form.

validate

validate: function(self)

Tells if all the form’s fields meet the requirements.

Return Value

Returns true if all of the form’s fields met the required criteria, else false.

See Also

BlazeGears.Form.Field.createRule

BlazeGears.Form.Field

A class that represents a field of a form object.

Superclasses

BlazeGears.BaseClass

Summary
Variables
attribsEach key of this dictionary will be an attribute of the field.
columnsThe horizontal dimension of a textbox.
eventsEach key of this dictionary will be an event of the field.
labelThe human-readable name of the field.
rowsThe vertical dimension of a textbox.
templateIf it isn’t null, the field will use this BGTL template upon generating itself, instead of the ones provided by the form object.
textsIf it isn’t null, the field will use this text-pack upon generating itself, instead of the ones provided by the form object.
valueThe default value of the field.
Functions
createOptionAdds an option to the field.
createRuleAttaches a rule to the field.
getElementIdReturns the ID of the field’s input element.
getIdReturns the ID of the field.
getOptionsReturns an array of the field’s option objects.
getValueReturns the value of the field’s input element.

Variables

attribs

attribs: {}

Each key of this dictionary will be an attribute of the field.

columns

columns: 25

The horizontal dimension of a textbox.  This is only applicable to fields that use a textarea as their input.

events

events: {}

Each key of this dictionary will be an event of the field.  The “on” prefix will be applied to the keys automatically.

label

label: null

The human-readable name of the field.  Defaults to the ID of the field.

rows

rows: 5

The vertical dimension of a textbox.  This is only applicable to fields that use a textarea as their input.

template

template: null

If it isn’t null, the field will use this BGTL template upon generating itself, instead of the ones provided by the form object.

See Also

BlazeGears.BGTL

texts

texts: null

If it isn’t null, the field will use this text-pack upon generating itself, instead of the ones provided by the form object.

value

value: null

The default value of the field.  Will be updated upon the validation of the form or calling getValue.

See Also

  • BlazeGears.Form.validate
  • getValue

Functions

createOption

createOption: function(self,
id)

Adds an option to the field.  This is only applicable to fields that use some kind of option selection method, like select lists, radio buttons, or checkboxes.

Arguments

[id = null]The ID of the option.  If not provided, a random one will be generated.  This is important for checkboxes, since their IDs will be their names.

Return Value

Returns a referece to the newly created option object.

See Also

  • BlazeGears.Form.Option
  • getOptions

createRule

createRule: function(self,
rule,
invalid,
valid)

Attaches a rule to the field.  Upon validation the field must meet the criteria dictated by these rules or the validation of the form will fail.

Arguments

ruleThe rule can be either a regular expression or a callback function.  If it’s a regular expression, it will be tested against the value of the field.  If it’s a callback function, it will be called with a reference to the field as its first argument.  If the callback function returns true, the field will pass this rule.
[invalid = null]This message will be displayed if the field fails this rule.
[valid = null]This message will be displayed if the field passes this rule.

See Also

BlazeGears.Form.validate

getElementId

getElementId: function(self)

Return Value

Returns the ID of the field’s input element.

This element won’t exist for fields that use radio buttons or checkboxes.

getId

getId: function(self)

Return Value

Returns the ID of the field.

getOptions

getOptions: function(self)

Return Value

Returns an array of the field’s option objects.

See Also

BlazeGears.Form.Option

getValue

getValue: function(self)

Return Value

Returns the value of the field’s input element.

See Also

value

BlazeGears.Form.Option

A class that represents an option of a field object.

This can either mean radio buttons, checkboxes, or select-list options.

Superclasses

BlazeGears.BaseClass

Summary
Variables
attribsEach key of this dictionary will be an attribute of the option.
eventsEach key of this dictionary will be an event of the option.
labelThe human-readable name of the option.
selectedIf it’s true, the option will be marked as selected upon generation.
valueThe value of the option.
Functions
getElementIdReturns the ID of the option’s input or option element.
getIdReturns the ID of the option.

Variables

attribs

attribs: {}

Each key of this dictionary will be an attribute of the option.

events

events: {}

Each key of this dictionary will be an event of the option.  The “on” prefix will be applied to the keys automatically.

label

label: null

The human-readable name of the option.  Defaults to the ID of the option.

selected

selected: false

If it’s true, the option will be marked as selected upon generation.

value

value: null

The value of the option.  Defaults to the ID of the option.

Functions

getElementId

getElementId: function(self)

Return Value

Returns the ID of the option’s input or option element.

getId

getId: function(self)

Return Value

Returns the ID of the option.

Returns the ID of the option.
A class that puts all the functions from the BlazeGears namespace into an object-oriented context.
A singleton class that parses and executes HTML templates written in the BlazeGears Templating Language.
A class that represents a field of a form object.
A class that represents an option of a field object.
